articles.title: Aavesham box office collections: Fahadh Faasil tops 50Cr in India with 2nd Weekend Bigger than 1st - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Aavesham Has Grossed USD 4.75 Million (Rs. 39.50 Crore) Internationally, For A Worldwide Sum Of Nearly Rs. 92 Crore. The Film Will Be Crossing The Rs. 100 Crore Mark Tomorrow.
